Secure urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse gathers all necessary supplies for securing the urinary catheter.
Secure urinary catheter.subject: The nurse
Secure urinary catheter.tools: catheter securing device, adhesive strips, gloves

Secure urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse washes her hands thoroughly to maintain aseptic technique.
Secure urinary catheter.subject: The nurse

Secure urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse places the patient in a comfortable position to facilitate access to the catheter.
Secure urinary catheter.subject: The nurse

Secure urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse secures the urinary catheter using the appropriate securing device to prevent displacement.
Secure urinary catheter.subject: The nurse

Secure urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse disposes of any used materials and performs hand hygiene after completing the procedure.
Secure urinary catheter.subject: The nurse
